aws_route53_zone_association.description: Manages a Route53 Hosted Zone VPC association

zone_id.description: The private hosted zone to associate.

vpc_id.description: The VPC to associate with the private hosted zone.

vpc_region.description: The VPC's region. Defaults to the region of the AWS provider.

id.description: The calculated unique identifier for the association.

zone_id.description: The ID of the hosted zone for the association.

vpc_id.description: The ID of the VPC for the association.

vpc_region.description: The region in which the VPC identified by `vpc_id` was created.
